description: Woodruff (Asperula gussonii) is an incredibly amazing plant! It is widely known for its beautiful evergreen foliage and bright yellow, fragrant flowers that bloom in the springtime. It is also an incredibly hardy and low-maintenance species that is perfect for a variety of landscapes. During the winter months, its lush, deep-green leaves remain intact and give the area a boost of color and life. Woodruff is also deer resistant, drought tolerant, and it grows in a range of soil types. As an ornamental species, it is an awesome choice for beginner gardeners and experienced ones alike.
